simplified: 不管白猫黑猫，捉住老鼠就是好猫

pronunciation.pinyin: bù guǎn bái māo hēi māo , zhuō zhù lǎo shǔ jiù shì hǎo māo
pronunciation.wade_giles_pinyin: bu4 guan3 bai2 mao1 hei1 mao1 , zhuo1 zhu4 lao3 shu3 jiu4 shi4 hao3 mao1

details.simplified: 不管白猫黑猫，捉住老鼠就是好猫
details.traditional: 不管白貓黑貓，捉住老鼠就是好貓

meanings.value: it doesn't matter whether a cat is white or black; as long as it catches mice it's a good cat (variant of a Sichuanese saying used in a speech by Deng Xiaoping 鄧小平|邓小平[Deng4 Xiao3 ping2] in 1962, usually associated with his economic reforms starting in 1978, in which pragmatism was favored over ideological purity)
meanings.traditional: t doesn't matter whether a cat is white or black; as long as it catches mice it's a good cat ( a Sichuanese saying used in a speech by Deng Xiaoping 鄧小平|邓小平
